Main pronunciation 主要发音: niǎo

Original meaning 本义: Meaning slender and delicate, same as 嬝.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 袅袅 niǎo niǎo (curling upwards)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 姌也從女從弱

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 嫋 from female 女 nǚ and wings 弱 ruò C428 裊<嫋嬝褭> simp 袅.

Variant rule clarification :

嫋字的基本解释

嫋
niǎo
同“袅”。

嫋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niǎo］
［《廣韻》奴鳥切，上篠，泥。］
亦作“嬝1”。
(1)纤长柔美貌。
(2)摇曳；扭动。
(3)飘舞。
(4)悠扬婉转。参见“嫋嫋”。

嫋字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫋； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页269第05
【廣韻】奴鳥切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乃了切，?音褭。風動貌。【楚辭·九歌】嫋嫋兮秋風。　又長弱貌。【鮑照詩】嫋嫋柳垂條。　又悠揚貌。【蘇軾·赤壁賦】餘音嫋嫋。【六書故】與裊通。俗作嬝。　又【集韻】【韻會】日灼切【正韻】如灼切，?音弱。長貌。【司馬相如·上林賦】娬媚姌嫋。　又【集韻】昵格切，音蹃。又乃歷切，音溺。義?同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niǎo］
["Guangyun" Slave bird cut, upper xiao, mud. ]
Also known as "碅1".
(1) Slender, soft and beautiful appearance.
(2) Swaying; twisting.
(3) Fluttering.
(4) Melodious and tactful. See "Curl".
delicate

[Guang Yun] Slave Bird Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] It’s cut,? Yin Za. Windy appearance. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] curled into the autumn breeze.　Long and weak appearance. [Bao Zhaoshi] Curly willow sticks.　A melodious look again. 【Su Shi·Chibi Fu】The remaining sound curls up. [Six Book History] is connected with curls. Vulgar as a curl.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Sunburst Cut [Zheng Yun] is like a searing cut, and the sound is weak. Long-looking. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Warming and charming.　[Jiyun] Nigeche, Yinhe. It is also a history, sound drowning. Righteous? Same.
